message: I propose a 90/10 split.  I figure I'm doing the thinking here, so I deserve the larger share. But I'm willing to negotiate.  What do you think?
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 seems fair, considering we both need to agree.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think a 65/35 split is fairer given the value of my time and my willingness to negotiate. Let's get this done!
I think we're getting closer. I'm willing to compromise, 55-45 seems like a good middle ground.
